definition: double happiness/the combined symmetric character 囍 (similar to 喜喜) as symbol of good luck, esp. marriage
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
two simultaneous happy events in the family

sentences.english: Paper cuts which show the Chinese character for double happiness are often used to celebrate weddings.
sentences.chinese: 剪紙漢字雙喜常常用於慶祝婚禮。

sentences.english: We'd like to put one big "Double Happiness" on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 我們想在牆上貼個大“雙喜”字。

sentences.english: The picture above shows Double Delight roses growing in my home garden.
sentences.chinese: 上面的圖片顯示雙喜玫瑰在我家花園裏成長。

sentences.english: Two "hsi" graphs together represents the wish for the two young newlyweds to have happiness together.
sentences.chinese: 雙喜字代表對新婚夫婦幸福生活的祝福。

sentences.english: That means you'll have double happiness.
sentences.chinese: 那就說明你會雙喜臨門唄。

sentences.english: For Erson, 51, it's a double blessing.
sentences.chinese: 對51歲的爾森來說，這是一件雙喜臨門的事。

definition: an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)
see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
